what: Utility Functions For Urban Morphometric Analyses
title: Utility Functions For Urban Morphometric Analyses
text: multi (Morphometric UtiLiTIes) provides utility functions make basic steps — cleaning street networks, creating spatial units, etc. — urban morphometric analyses easier.

title: Utility Functions For Urban Morphometric Analyses
text: can install development version multi GitHub :

title: Bangalore Morphology Data — bangalore_boundary
text: data sets contain example morphometric data Bangalore obtained OpenStreetMap using osmdata package. Bangalore Boundary

title: Bangalore Morphology Data — bangalore_boundary
Bangalore Morphology Data — bangalore_boundary
text: sf POLYGON geometries define extents study area.

what: Create street block spatial units. — st_create_streetblocks
title: Create street block spatial units. — st_create_streetblocks
text: Create street block spatial units.

title: Create street block spatial units. — st_create_streetblocks
Create street block spatial units. — st_create_streetblocks
text: x sf object LINESTRING geometries representing street network. boundary sf object POLYGON geometries representing extents study area. merge_threshold numeric; value represents smallest acceptable size spatial unit. Contiguous units iteratively merged value reached. skip process, set merge_threshold = NULL. verbose logical; FALSE status messages output.

title: Create street block spatial units. — st_create_streetblocks
text: sf object POLYGON geometries representing street block spatial units.

title: Create street block spatial units. — st_create_streetblocks
code: street_blocks <- st_create_streetblocks(x = bangalore_highways, boundary = bangalore_boundary, merge_threshold = 1, verbose = FALSE) #> Spherical geometry (s2) switched off #> Linking to GEOS 3.10.2, GDAL 3.4.1, PROJ 8.2.1; sf_use_s2() is FALSE plot(street_blocks)

what: Extract connected streets from a data frame containing linestrings representing street networks. — st_extract_connected

title: Extract connected streets from a data frame containing linestrings representing street networks. — st_extract_connected
Extract connected streets from a data frame containing linestrings representing street networks. — st_extract_connected
text: x sf object LINESTRING geometries.

title: Extract connected streets from a data frame containing linestrings representing street networks. — st_extract_connected
text: sf object containing subset x.

title: Extract connected streets from a data frame containing linestrings representing street networks. — st_extract_connected
code: connected_streets <- st_extract_connected(bangalore_highways) #> although coordinates are longitude/latitude, st_intersects assumes that they #> are planar connected_streets #> Simple feature collection with 417 features and 2 fields #> Geometry type: LINESTRING #> Dimension:     XY #> Bounding box:  xmin: 77.5771 ymin: 12.95439 xmax: 77.59503 ymax: 12.97567 #> Geodetic CRS:  WGS 84 #> First 10 features: #>            osm_id     highway                       geometry #> 8687347   8687347 residential LINESTRING (77.58983 12.960... #> 22893740 22893740     primary LINESTRING (77.58761 12.967... #> 23076921 23076921   secondary LINESTRING (77.58399 12.963... #> 23076927 23076927     primary LINESTRING (77.58735 12.967... #> 23076955 23076955    tertiary LINESTRING (77.58846 12.967... #> 23081473 23081473 residential LINESTRING (77.58395 12.963... #> 23081479 23081479 residential LINESTRING (77.58751 12.960... #> 23081496 23081496 residential LINESTRING (77.58227 12.961... #> 23081501 23081501 residential LINESTRING (77.58127 12.961... #> 23081545 23081545 residential LINESTRING (77.57966 12.961...

code: disconnected_streets <- st_extract_disconnected(bangalore_highways) #> although coordinates are longitude/latitude, st_intersects assumes that they #> are planar disconnected_streets #> Simple feature collection with 2 features and 2 fields #> Geometry type: LINESTRING #> Dimension:     XY #> Bounding box:  xmin: 77.58552 ymin: 12.96382 xmax: 77.59284 ymax: 12.96821 #> Geodetic CRS:  WGS 84 #>                osm_id highway                       geometry #> 367139321   367139321   steps LINESTRING (77.58552 12.963... #> 1162816462 1162816462 footway LINESTRING (77.59284 12.968...

title: Extract street intersections. — st_extract_intersections
text: Extract street intersections.

title: Extract street intersections. — st_extract_intersections
Extract street intersections. — st_extract_intersections
text: x sf object LINESTRING geometries representing street networks.

title: Extract street intersections. — st_extract_intersections
text: sf object POINT geometries representing street intersections.

title: Extract street intersections. — st_extract_intersections
code: intersections <- st_extract_intersections(bangalore_highways) #> although coordinates are longitude/latitude, st_intersection assumes that they #> are planar #> although coordinates are longitude/latitude, st_intersects assumes that they #> are planar plot(bangalore_highways, col = "black") plot(intersections, col = "red", add = TRUE)

what: Iteratively merge spatial units to ensure all of them meet a minimum area threshold. — st_merge_spatialunits
title: Iteratively merge spatial units to ensure all of them meet a minimum area threshold. — st_merge_spatialunits
text: Iteratively merge spatial units ensure meet minimum area threshold.

title: Iteratively merge spatial units to ensure all of them meet a minimum area threshold. — st_merge_spatialunits
Iteratively merge spatial units to ensure all of them meet a minimum area threshold. — st_merge_spatialunits
text: x sf object POLYGON geometries representing spatial units merged. merge_threshold numeric; value square meters represents smallest acceptable area spatial unit. Contiguous units iteratively merged value reached. skip process, set merge_threshold = NULL. verbose logical; FALSE status messages output.

title: Iteratively merge spatial units to ensure all of them meet a minimum area threshold. — st_merge_spatialunits
text: sf object POLYGON geometries representing street block spatial units.
